alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 9:57PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Prowers and southeastern Kiowa Counties through 1045 PM MDT... At 957 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Granada, or 10 miles east of Lamar, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Granada around 1005 PM MDT. Bristol around 1010 PM MDT. Hartman around 1015 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Holly. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
